synonyms: gokule—in Gokula Vṛndāvana; kevalā rati—flawless attachment; aiśvarya-jñāna-hīna—without reverential considerations; purī-dvaye—in two purīs, namely Mathurā Purī and Dvārakā Purī; vaikuṇṭha-ādye—in the Vaikuṇṭha planets; aiśvarya-pravīṇa—prominence of awe and reverence.
translation: "Pure attachment without reverence is found in Goloka Vṛndāvana. Attachment in which awe and reverence are prominent is found in the two cities Mathurā and Dvārakā and in Vaikuṇṭha.
